Zethu Dlomo-Mphahlele (a mụrụ na 31 Machị 1989), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ 'Madi' na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn America Black Sails
A mụrụ ya na 31 Machị afọ̀ 1989 na Lenasia, Gauteng province, South Africa. E mechara zụlite ya na Mmesi Park, Dobsonville, Soweto
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na The National School of the Arts
N'afọ 2010, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor Degree Honours na Dramatic Art na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand
N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2018, ọ lụrụ onye ya na ya na-eme ihe nkiri ogologo oge bụ Lebogang Mphahlele.
N'afọ 2012, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn sayensị nke a na-akpọ Room 9 na SABC 1
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Detective Alice Kunene' na usoro ahụ
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọ gosipụtara na ọtụtụ ihe ngosi mba ụwa; dịka usoro HBO Number One Ladies Detective Agency n'afọ̀ 2008 dịka 'Baone Magasane'
Mgbe ahụ n'qfọ̀ 2013, ọ pụtara na ọrụ cameo 'Patience' na ihe nkiri Mary na Martha nke Phillip Noyce duziri.
N'afọ 2014, ọ gosipụtakwara na Canadian Broadcasting Corporation (CBC) na BET International (BET) zụ Book of Negroes ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke ohu dị ime 'Sanu'
N'afọ 2014, o mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na ihe nkiri Fanie Fourieńs Lobola dịka 'Dinky Magubane'

Maka ọrụ ya, ọ meriri ma South African Film and Television Awards (SAFTA) n'afọ 2014 nakwa South Africa India Film and Television Award (SAIFTA) n'afọ 2013 nhọpụta na ngalaba nke 'Best Actress in a Feature Film'
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkwado na oge 1 nke usoro telivishọn Ayeye dịka 'Sibongile'. N'afọ 2015, a tụbara ya maka ọrụ 'Madi' na oge nke atọ nke Black Sails, usoro Starz Network
Ọ gara n'ihu na-eme maka ihe omume iri na isii na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ugboro ugboro na ọrụ dịka nwa nwanyị Maazị Scott, Madi ruo na njedebe nke oge nke anọ
Usoro ahụ nyere ya nkwado mba ụwa.

Ka ọ dị ugbu a, Dlomo meriri ihe nrite maka 'Brett Goldin Best Newcomer' n'afọ 2014/2015 Naledi Theatre Awards maka ọtụtụ ihe odide ya na egwuregwu egwuregwu Have You Seen Zandile? nke Khutjo Green duziri
N'afọ 2017, ọ kwagara Africa iji mee ihe nkiri na telenovelas kachasị ewu ewu na South Africa Isibaya N'ime usoro ihe nkiri ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Nonhlanzi' aka 'LethuHlatshwayo'
Mgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara na egwuregwu abụọ: Jero nke Dominique Gumede duziri, na Play nke Khutjo Green duziri.

Na ngwụcha afọ 2017, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri ọdịda anyanwụ South Africa nke mbụ Five Fingers for Marseilles Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ahụ dịka 'Lerato'. Ihe nkiri ahụ nwere ihe ngosi ụwa ya na Toronto International Film Festival e mechara wepụta ya na sinima na United States of America na Septemba afọ 2018. N'afọ 2018, Dlomo pụtara na ihe nkiri Mandela10 Gun nke John Irvin duziri
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ Winnie, nwunye Nelson Mandela na ihe nkiri ahụ
Ihe nkiri ahụ nwere ihe ngosi ụwa ya na New York, Harlem NY
Ka e mesịrị n'otu afọ ahụ, ọ sonyeere ihe nkiri Mzansi Magic Sunday mgbede The Herd na ọrụ 'Lwandle'.
N'afọ 2020, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi Hotel on the Koppies nke Charlie Vundla dere ma duzie
Mgbe ahụ, ọ sonyeere obere usoro SABC 1 nke akpọrọ Amazing Grace na ọrụ 'Sarah'
N'ikpeazụ tupu ọrịa COVID-19, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Lindo Cele' na usoro ihe nkiri nke a na-akpọ Erased telivishọn site na Moja Love Channel.
